entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:55 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
